stimulusHtml:
A veterinarian interested in pet nutrition surveyed owners of a single pet (either a dog, a cat, or a ferret) to ask whether they feed their pet primarily dry pet food, canned pet food, or home-cooked food. The following segmented bar graph shows the distribution of the three types of food for each type of pet.

Which of the following statements about pet owners in the survey is supported by the segmented bar graph?
choicesHtml: Of all owners who fed their pet primarily dry pet food, the least number owned a cat.
More than half of the owners fed their pet primarily canned pet food.
Ninety percent of owners fed their pets primarily dry pet food.
The number of ferret owners who fed their pets primarily dry pet food was equal to the number of ferret owners who fed their pets primarily home-cooked food.
A majority of dog owners fed their pets primarily canned pet food.
